message.content:
cs.PL, cs.AI, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.LG

The paper proposes a machine learning-based approach for defining transformation strategies of a program transformation system. This involves using reinforcement learning and classification methods to tackle the problems inherent in heterogeneous systems. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.PL (Programming Languages) as the paper deals with program transformation. The use of machine learning also suggests that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are likely sub-categories. The integration of specialized devices and the complexity in programming such systems suggests that cs.AR (Architecture) and cs.SE (Software Engineering) are also possible sub-categories.
